sentences.en: a ban on beef imports
sentences.cn: 禁止进口牛肉

sentences.en: A restricted import quota was set for meat products.
sentences.cn: 肉类产品设定了进口配额.

sentences.en: American demand for Japanese imports (= goods from Japan )
sentences.cn: 美国人对日本进口产品的需求

sentences.en: Germany, however, insists on restrictions on the import of Polish coal.
sentences.cn: 但是德国坚持对进口波兰煤炭加以限制.

sentences.en: I have already spoken about the import of his speech.
sentences.cn: 有关他的讲话的含意我刚刚已经谈过了。

sentences.en: Import controls were extended to the paper industry.
sentences.cn: 进口的限制范围扩大到造纸工业.

sentences.en: Import duties still average 30%.
sentences.cn: 进口税的平均水平仍然在30%。

sentences.en: In 2001, Britain exported more cars than it imported.
sentences.cn: 2001年英国的汽车出口量大于进口。

sentences.en: Rich countries benefited from importing Indonesia's timber.
sentences.cn: 富国从进口印度尼西亚木材中获利。

sentences.en: the abolition of import duties
sentences.cn: 进口关税的废止

sentences.en: The beetle is thought to be a European import.
sentences.cn: 这种甲虫被认为是从欧洲传入的。

sentences.en: the import of electrical goods
sentences.cn: 电气产品的进口

sentences.en: The painting was returned to Spain on a temporary import licence.
sentences.cn: 这幅画凭着临时进口许可证被送回了西班牙。

sentences.en: to introduce a strict import quota on grain
sentences.cn: 严格限制谷物进口量

sentences.en: We import an incredible amount of cheese from the Continent.
sentences.cn: 我们从欧洲大陆进口数量惊人的奶酪。

sentences.en: We import foreign manufactured goods.
sentences.cn: 我们进口国外制成品。

sentences.en: We import raw materials and energy and export mainly in-dustrial products.
sentences.cn: 我们进口原材料和能源，主要出口工业产品。

sentences.en: We import raw silk.
sentences.cn: 我们进口生丝.

sentences.en: We must produce more food for ourselves and import less.
sentences.cn: 我们必须增产食品,减少进口.

sentences.en: What does this import?
sentences.cn: 这含有什么意思?

sentences.en: What's the import of the speech?
sentences.cn: 这个演说的意义是什么?

sentences.en: You can import files from Microsoft Word 5.1 or MacWrite II.
sentences.cn: 可以从MicrosoftWord5.1或MacWriteII程序导入文件。

sentences.en: You can then export this profile so that other users can simply import the profile.
sentences.cn: 您可以输出这个轮廓，这样其他用户仅仅只需要输入这个轮廓即可。

words.tran_cn: 重要的，重大的；有地位的；有权力的
重要地；大量地；有名望地；自命不凡地
[贸易]进口，进口货；输入；意思，含义；重要性
输入，[贸易]进口；含…的意思

phrases.tran_cn: 进出口；导入和导出；输入和输出

trans.tran_en: a product that is brought from one country into another so that it can be sold there, or the business of doing this
to bring a product from one country into another so that it can be sold there

trans.tran_cn: 进口,输入,(pl.)进口商品;要旨,含意

trans.tran_en: to bring a product from one country into another so that it can be sold there
